div.div: at Grove City, Pa. | Robert E Thorn Field

tr.td: Thiel wins toss, defers. Grove City to receive, defending north goal.
Cody McClelland kickoff 57 yards to the GRO8, Gabriel Moore return 17 yards to the GRO25 (Ryan Rowland).
Aaron Lundmark pass incomplete to Ryan Duran.
Aaron Lundmark pass incomplete to Luke Brancato.
Aaron Lundmark rush for loss of 5 yards to the GRO20, fumble by Aaron Lundmark recovered by GRO Aaron Lundmark at GRO19 (Mike Finchio).
Anth. Marnejon punt 11 yards to the GRO30, downed.
Ryan Radke rush for 1 yard to the GRO29 (Robert Rollick).
Taylor Fink rush for 16 yards to the GRO13, 1ST DOWN THI (Jake Seibert).
